alert.note: Alert for Vega Alta; Vega Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 01 at 8:53PM AST until February 02 at 12:00AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Vega Alta in Puerto Rico... Vega Baja in Puerto Rico... * Until midnight AST. * At 853 PM AST, Emergency management in Vega Alta reports flooding associated with water surges and heavy rainfall. Up to 2 to 4 inches of rain has fallen in the area. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area, as well as additional water surges. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
